page.title: 15Eckington Family Holidays.
page.content: We found that 72% of families took a holiday every year. Of these 80% had a holiday in this country . These families went to Wales, Devon, Yorkshire, Sussex, Cornwall, Anglesey, London, Newcastle, Edinburgh, Barry and Scotland. 42% of the holiday families went abroad. They visited countries like Denmark, France, Greece, Minorca, Spain, Portugal, Holland, Ibeza, Germany, Ireland, Norway, America, Belgium, Italy and Australia. 12% of the families went on one holiday, 16% had two holidays a year, and 14% were having three holidays in 1985. Most families went on holiday by car. 12% went camping, 4% boating, 18% stayed with relatives, 24% stayed in a hotel, 6% in a chalet park, 10% in a caravan, 29% in a holiday camp, and 10% stayed in a furnished house or cottage.
